sources.title: Smoky Trails (1939) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Jean Carmen, Murdock MacQuarrie
Director: Bernard B. Ray

Trailing the men who murdered his father, Bob Archer finds a man in a gunfight. He helps him to escape only to be knocked out by him and captured by the Sheriff.

metadata.Plot: Trailing the men that murdered his father, Bob Archer finds a man in a gunfight. He helps him to escape only to be knocked out by him and captured by the Sheriff. Learning the man he helped was his father's murderer, he convinces the Deputy to release him. Posing as an outlaw, he finds the gang's hideout and there is the man he helped. But the leader of the gang has taken away his gun and he is not allowed to leave.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Jean Carmen, Murdock MacQuarrie
